title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.27 - Payments to the New York State Thoroughbred Breeding and Development Fund
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4009.27 - Payments to the New York State Thoroughbred Breeding and Development Fund

State Regulations

Every corporation, association or nonprofit racing
association shall pay to the New York State Thoroughbred Breeding and

Development Fund the percentage of the pari-mutuel pool as required by law when
the payment of State taxes are due to the State Tax

Commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4009.27

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
